name: Simple Tilezilla
description:
This theme was based on a theme from another user, but I've since lost track of them.
The tabs don't have text and are big and square. The favicons are centred and the sound indicator is shown on top. The address bar has a transparent background. This Theme was only tested in Dev Edition. YMMV.

If you are using this theme and it breaks, leave me a message and I'll try my best to fix it.
